text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Ask Trump why NATO was formed? 

Ask what First Amendment is? 

Ask why Coronavirus continues to spread? 

Ask why he attacks Amer. Allies & Elevates 🇺🇸Enemies?
